Courses.Remarks:
Topic: Philosophy for the Future: Thinking Across Worlds
What happens when ideas from Asia and the West meet? This course explores how philosophers around the globe are reimagining timeless questions—about self, meaning, and the good life—for an uncertain future. You’ll encounter creative thinkers who cross cultural and disciplinary boundaries to build new ways of understanding the world and our place in it.
